review_title: Wonderful experience at Northwestern University; personally and academically fulfilling
job_title: Fremdsprachassistent für Englisch in Freiburg im Breisgau
pros: Provided me with a slew of opportunities and advantages which I do not believe I could have had at many other universities
cons: Mental health on campus was poor, with far more people in need of counselling than there were counsellors to support them.
